body: This chapter literally features the antagonist forcing the protagonist to be his sex slave despite them saying they don't want that. If you don't see that as mind control, you don't understand what mind control is.

What do you mean no mind control?! Last time I checked Cumming in a girl doesn't make them suddenly switch from "yes have sex with me before I turn back into a dude" to "fuck being a dude I will devote my entire life to being your sex slave."
people are saying don’t use the mind control tag, i think the mind control is in this series story but it’s not in this chapter

Yeah, uh, this was pretty weak. I still managed to cum, but I was just staring at the last page for basically the whole time because there was nothing left to read. There were a lot of more satisfying ways this could've ended, even basically with this same story outline, but they were all at least 15 pages longer for the final chapter. 
But whatever, I didn't give the creator any money, so I guess that's on me.
no mind control, dont random tag pls
Waited years for a sequel, thank you
I wanted this so bad. Now i feel like all I wanted was more

I'm glad we finally had a conclusion, but it feels a bit lacking. like we didn't get to see the final bit of mind-break when this chick becomes a slave. It just feels like there's more that we could have seen and that makes it feel like a tease!
Honly shit I'd given up on there ever being a conclusion to this. The first one was the first doujin that I ever whent back to repeatedly so this actually means a lot to me.
I agree least it finally has an ending

Whoa! We finally got a conclusion to Gal-iro ni Somaru? What wonderful luck!

It has the same spirit from the first chapter but wished the ending was different.. Otherwise, I'm glad there's a conclusion!
